nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence

Class LevelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.LevelReader

  • public class LevelReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods and static variables required for reading levels from json files Contains methods that return a maze which will be parsed maze module.
